awashya drawya: pasal upakarana saha lipidrawya, sellam badu, pasal yana wayase lamun sandaha andum, wadihitiyan sandaha andum, anda athirili, kotta ura, thuwa, maduru dal, kussi upakarana, wiyali aahara drawya, beheth drawya, pirisidu kirime upakarana, detol, hapik wishabija nashaka saha saban warga, kantha saniparakshaka thuwa, pusthakala sandaha kiyawim poth dumriya sthana: kankasanthure, yapanaya, kilinochchiya, wawuniyawa, madawachchiya, anuradhapura , thambauththegama, mahawa, ganewaththa, kurunagala , polgahawela , alawwa, ambaepussa, mirigama, weyangoda, ganemulla, gampaha, hunupitiya kalaniya, dematagoda,maradana, ragama, kotuwa, galkissa , moratuwa , panadura meki sathkaryayata amatharawa sahodarathwaye dumriyen paminena sahrudayinge athwalin mathara pitabaddara dadli senanayaka jathika pasala pirisidu kirime shramadanaya juni masa 11 wana dina udasana 7 sita dawasa pura sidu sidukirimata ‘purawasi athwala’ sanwidhanaya salasum kota atha.

ambaa paluya anubhawa kirimen pasuwa giri dewiyata palanaya kara gatha nohaki ragika aashawak athi wannata wuna.kemen kemen ee thathwaya ugra wannata wuna..thama sahodaraya ninden awadi kala aya ohu ha dawatennata wuna..ninden awadi wu dala kumarutada me thathwayama athiwu thibuna.ohutada palanaya kara gatha nohaki ragika aashawak thama naginiya kere athi wannata wuna.me sansiddhiya awasanaye prathipalayak lesa dala kumaru ha giri dewiya sanwasaye yedennata wuna..nawatha piyawi sihiyata elambai kala siduwu de gana dedenatama kala kirimak athi wuna..thama sohoyura athin thama gab gath baw danagath giri dewiya wal pataka elli gela walala miya giyaya.miya yanawita gab aragena siti aya miya yamen pasu “giri yakinna “ namin kuda lamayin hata wina karana yakshaniyakwi upatha labu bawa pawasenawa..dala kumaruda meki siddhiyen pasu siyadiwi hani karaganna ladi ohu “gara yakshaya“ namin yak bhawane upatha labiya....onna yaluwane ooka thamayi siddhiya...gara yaka gana thawa wadipura wisthara tikak eelaga postuwakin pala karannam..
